summary: Chechen rebels take over a Russian nuclear plant and it's up to a mysterious agent (Snipes) to stop them.
cast: Wesley Snipes|William Hope|Emma Samms|Anthony Warren|Peter Youngblood Hills|Ryan McCluskey|Warren Derosa|Christiaan Haig|Dan Badarau|Serge Soric|Gelu Nitu|Matt Salinger|John Guerrasio|Ian Ashpitel|Peter Swander|Johnny Myers|Vlad Ivanov|Mihai Dinvale|Tania Popa|Toma Vasile|Radu Bânzaru|Bogdan Uritescu|Gabi Burlacu|Catalin Banghia|Alin Luchian|Razvan Radu|Marius Florian|Tim Abell|Richard L. Fox|Darcas Macopson|Andrew Stevens
title: El objetivo
